citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
The licensee was observed exhibiting animals at a circus in Ohio, but a current itinerary had not been submitted to Animal
Care prior to the event. The licensee stated that he had forgotten to submit the itinerary.
It is important to submit an itinerary, within the designated time frame, so that Animal Care is aware of regulated animal
movement and exhibition within the country, and inspections can be performed at all approved sites as efficiently as
possible.
The licensee must submit an itinerary to the Deputy Administrator for any upcoming events that are at a location other
than the approved home site and that extend overnight.
Correct by March 24, 2023.
This inspection was completed at the Zenobia Shrine Circus at the Glass City Center in Toledo, Ohio.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(c) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
The licensee was observed exhibiting animals at a circus in Ohio, but a current itinerary had not been submitted to Animal 
Care prior to the event.  The licensee stated that he had forgotten to submit the itinerary.   
It is important to submit an itinerary, within the designated time frame, so that Animal Care is aware of regulated animal 
movement and exhibition within the country, and inspections can be performed at all approved sites as efficiently as 
possible.  
The licensee must submit an itinerary to the Deputy Administrator for any upcoming events that are at a location other 
than the approved home site and that extend overnight. 
Correct by March 24, 2023. 
 
This inspection was completed at the Zenobia Shrine Circus at the Glass City Center in Toledo, Ohio.  
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
